purpose: Provide a common interface to interact with AI agents, facilitating interoperability across different tech stacks.
principle: Defines a standardized protocol using OpenAPI specifications to enable communication with AI agents, regardless of the underlying technology.
reusability: Highly reusable through its OpenAPI-based interface, allowing integration with various agent frameworks and languages.
limitations: Being in alpha stage, it may have incomplete features and potential stability issues. Limited documentation might affect ease of adoption.
name: agent-protocol
description: Common interface for interacting with AI agents. The protocol is tech stack agnostic - you can use it with any framework for building agents.
highlight: Tech stack agnostic protocol for seamless integration with any AI agent framework.
